original_text: After that he brought me toward the south, and behold a gate toward the south: and he measured the posts thereof and the arches thereof according to these measures.
korean_text: 그가 또 나를 이끌고 남으로 간즉 남쪽을 향한 문간이 있는데 그 벽과 현관을 측량하니 먼저 측량한 것과 같고

sentences.original_text: After that he brought me toward the south
sentences.korean_translation: 그 후에 그는 나를 남쪽으로 데려갔고

sentences.original_text: and behold a gate toward the south
and he measured the posts thereof
